Boruto lands a few hits on the opponent between Sarada's [[shuriken]] being thrown and hitting her target. With the opponent stunned, Sarada lands an uppercut, sending the opponent into the air, while she and Boruto jump backwards, putting distance between themselves and their opponent. Boruto throws a [[vanishing Rasengan]], and Sarada sends lightning chakra-charged [[kunai]], resulting in an explosion.
